Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ibis Moscow Dynamo in Moscow (Khoroshevskiy), you'll be convenient to Megasport Arena and Central Moscow Hippodrome. This hotel is within close proximity of Experimentanium and Cathedral of the Immaculate Conception.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 317 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Ibis Moscow Dynamo. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. This hotel has 5 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Ibis Moscow Dynamo. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 317 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Ibis Moscow Dynamo in Moscow (Khoroshevskiy), you'll be convenient to Megasport Arena and Central Moscow Hippodrome. This hotel is within close proximity of Experimentanium and Cathedral of the Immaculate Conception.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Megasport Arena - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Central Moscow Hippodrome - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Experimentanium - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Cathedral of the Immaculate Conception - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Glinka National Museum Consortium of Musical Culture - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Presnya Historical Memorial Museum - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Mossovet Theatre - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Bulgakov Museum - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Moscow Zoo - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Tchaikovsky Concert Hall - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Moscow Planetarium - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Dostoevsky Museum - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Praktika Theater - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Patriarch's Pond - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi

The preferred airport for Ibis Moscow Dynamo is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 21 km / 13.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
